entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
